title: The Lord of the Rings
description: Frodo Baggins, a hobbit from the Shire, is entrusted with the task of destroying the One Ring, an artifact of great power created by the Dark Lord Sauron. With the help of his friends and allies, he embarks on a perilous journey to Mount Doom, where the ring can be destroyed.

title: The Name of the Wind
description: Kvothe, a legendary magician and musician, tells the story of his life to a chronicler. He recounts his childhood as part of a traveling troupe, his time at a prestigious university, and his quest for revenge against the Chandrian, a group of powerful beings who killed his family.

title: A Song of Ice and Fire
description: In the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros, noble families vie for control of the Iron Throne. But as war and political intrigue threaten to tear the realm apart, a dark force begins to stir in the north. The fate of the kingdom rests on the shoulders of a few brave individuals.

title: The Wheel of Time
description: The Wheel of Time is a series of high fantasy novels by American author Robert Jordan, with Brandon Sanderson as a co-author for the final three installments. Originally planned as a six-book series with the publication of The Eye of the World in 1990, The Wheel of Time came to span 14 volumes, in addition to a prequel novel and three companion books. Jordan died in 2007 while working on what was planned to be the twelfth and final volume in the series. He prepared extensive notes, which enabled fellow fantasy author Sanderson to complete the final book, which grew into three volumes: The Gathering Storm (2009), Towers of Midnight (2010), and A Memory of Light (2013).
